itemDesc: A light machine gun designed for sustained suppressive fire against infantry.
A heavy machine gun optimized for defensive positions and prolonged suppression.
A heavy machine gun designed for high-volume, sustained fire and area denial.
A heavy machine gun with a high rate of fire, effective for infantry suppression and area control.
A portable flamethrower used for close-range area denial and destruction of enemy structures.
An infantry support gun mounted on a tripod, effective against infantry, vehicles, and light fortifications.
A heavy anti-tank launcher capable of firing powerful rockets against armored vehicles.
